attributes.action: for a memorial statue of the great potatoe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the people wish to have a memorial statue errected of the great potatoe , we think it will be a gr8 sign of peace, joy and harmony between people of the city of norwich and also would represnt the struggels of the potatoe the great vegetable that has feed are nation for so many years

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
